id.description: A unique identifier for the glyph. Named after its primary word and numbered in order of coining or attestation.

word.description: The toki pona word which is written with this glyph.

word_id.description: The Linku id of the toki pona word this glyph writes.

usage_category.description: The glyph's usage category, derived from the data of the annual Linku glyph survey.

author.description: The name or names of those involved in creating this glyph.

author_source.description: The source or origin of this glyph, often a URL.

creation_date.description: When this glyph was created, to precision known

see_also.description: A list of related glyphs by ID

primary.description: Whether this glyph is the main glyph used to write the toki pona word in `word`

parent_id.description: The primary glyph which this glyph is considered to share its form with.

deprecated.description: Whether this glyph is considered deprecated by its author(s).

image.description: A URL to an image of the sitelen pona glyph.

svg.description: A URL to an SVG of the sitelen pona glyph.

ligature.description: The specific numerical ligature used to render this sitelen pona glyph.

alias_ligatures.description: All non-numerical ligature used to render this sitelen pona glyph.

ucsur.description: The UCSUR codepoint used to render this specific sitelen pona glyph.

usage.description: The percentage of respondents to the annual Linku word survey who report to use this glyph, by the date of the survey.

commentary.description: Localized commentary on this glyph, such as history, clarifications, or trivia.

names.description: A list of names used to refer to this sitelen pona glyph

items.description: A name this sitelen pona glyph is known by.

__schema0.description: A unique identifier for an object in Linku. Generally named after the object.

__schema1.description: A URL pointing to some external resource.
